metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7588 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in CImg v.220. A heap-based buffer over-read inload_bmp in CImg.h occurs when loading a crafted bmp image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7588` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cimg-examples - 1.7.9+dfsg-2ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cimg package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7.9+dfsg-2ubuntu0.18.04.1').
